title: [Initial Listing] Bitget Will List PublicAI (PUBLIC) in the Innovation and AI Zone
content:
[Initial Listing] Bitget Will List PublicAI (PUBLIC) in the Innovation and AI Zone
We are thrilled to announce that PublicAI (PUBLIC) will be listed in the Innovation and AI Zone. Check out the details below:
Deposit Available: Opened
Trading Available: 15 August 2025, 8:30 (UTC)
Withdrawal Available:  16 August 2025, 9:30 (UTC)
Spot Trading Link: PUBLIC/USDT
Introduction
PublicAI builds the Human Layer of AI, empowering people to earn by training AI with real data

token.publicailab.near
